short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired to click 50 times on the clap emoji on Medium ? Well try this one !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This tool helps you 1 one simple click to give 50 claps to a Medium article you want to highlight !

No fancy other feature ! Simple and functional !
